from lasagne.layers.base import Layer, MergeLayer
from lasagne.layers.input import InputLayer
l1 = [Mock(InputLayer((None,)), output_shape=(None,)), Mock(InputLayer((
    None,)), output_shape=(None,))]
l2 = [Mock(Layer(l1[0]), output_shape=(None,)), Mock(Layer(l1[1]),
    output_shape=(None,))]
l2[0].input_layer = l1[0]
l2[1].input_layer = l1[1]
l3 = Mock(MergeLayer(l2))
l3.input_layers = l2
return l1, l2, l3
pytest.fixture
